channel.title: Music – 맥대디(Mckdaddy)
channel.description: Recent content in 맥대디(Mckdaddy) on Music

item.title: 저스디스(JUSTHIS),던말릭(DON MALIK),허성현(Huh),KHAN,맥대디(Mckdaddy),Los - 마이웨이 (MY WAY) (Prod. by R.Tee)
